incident_updates.body: Dear customer, please be advised that repair works are underway and engineers are working to restore services as soon as possible. More updates to follow.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

An incident is in progress on our Backbone offer. It has temporarily affected the availability. We are actively working to resolve this problem. Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 03/09/2024 18:20 UTC Service impact : Our backbone in Madrid is temporarly unavailable. The network transit through Madrid is temporarily unavailable. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Please be advised that you may experience micro flaps once a week.
Our teams are developing a solution. Updates will be provided as soon as significant progress is made.

You may have experienced flaps on 01/08/2024 between Chicago and Portland.
The first flap was at 08:52 UTC and lasted 20 seconds.
The second flap was at 18:48 UTC and lasted 5 seconds.
Since then, the link is stable.
We are currently monitoring the situation.

Our technical teams with our provider solved the issue.
Service is now fully restored.
We are currently monitoring the situation.

Loss has been experienced between Chicago and Portland from 16/07/2024 05:06 UTC to 16/07/2024 09:53 UTC.
No increase in latency observed.
Our technical teams are still working with our provider to solve the incident.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

You may have experience micro flap between Chicago and Portland.
Our technical teams are still working on the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

A flap has been experienced the 27/06/2024 03:20 UTC that lasted 2 seconds.
No more perturbations have been observed since.
Our teams are currently monitoring the link.
Start time : 01/05/2024 00:00 UTC Ongoing actions : Monitoring No network perturbation were observed over a week. We continue to monitor the link for the time being.

Start time : 01/05/2024 00:00 UTC Service impact : You may have experienced micro flap between Chicago and Portland. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
